layout.singingstanza: No man ev -- er, spoke like Je -- sus; No man ev -- er, no man ev -- er; No man ev -- er, spoke like Je -- sus, John se -- ven, for -- ty- six.
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2007 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: Jesus said, I'm the Bread! Peace, be still! Bring the children. He declared, I'm the Shepherd, Stretch your hand out! You're forgiv'n!
Jesus said, I'm resurrection! I can give you living water! If you've seen Me, you've seen the Father! No man ever spoke like Him!
